    • TaxCard

      public TaxCard​(java.lang.String name, int group, int position, Bank bank, boolean incomeTax)
      Create a new TaxCard object.

      name - name of tax card
      group - group of card
      position - position on board
      bank - bank associated with card
      incomeTax - true if income tax, false if luxury tax
